itunes:title: Episode 1 - The Beginning
title: Episode 1 - The Beginning
description: In the series premiere, we cover Max's early days at Bungie, the first Halo multiplayer prototypes, Halo 2’s “Warfare” game mode, Halo 2 design decisions, cut multiplayer modes, and more.
content:encoded: In the series premiere, we cover Max's early days at Bungie, the first Halo multiplayer prototypes, Halo 2’s “Warfare” game mode, Halo 2 design decisions, cut multiplayer modes, and more.
itunes:author: Andy "Bravo" Dudynsky
